long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Beacons for Managers is a productivity tool designed specifically for creator talent managers. With this Chrome extension, talent managers can easily access their pitch decks, creator rosters, creator media kits, and other pitch materials from anywhere in the browser. The app allows creator managers to quickly copy and insert links to all their pitch materials into emails or any platform on the web without interrupting their workflow. Streamline your processes and save time with Beacons for Managers.
